definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_huge_fungus"><field name="planted">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="99" w="243">This block represent a crimson fungus, like the ones found in the Crimson Forest biome.This feature should be added during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="stem"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.MUSHROOM_STEM</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the stem of the fungus</comment></block></value><value name="hat"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.RED_MUSHROOM_BLOCK</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the hat (or "leaves") of the fungus</comment></block></value><value name="decor"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.CAVE_AIR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the decorative block that can appear inside the fungus cap</comment></block></value><value name="ground"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">Blocks.MYCELIUM</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the valid ground for the fungus. It cannot generate on other blocks</comment></block></value><value name="replaceable_blocks"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Each chunk has 0 to 5 patches of fire</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">11</field><field name="max">33</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_uniform"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move the patches at a random height between the world boundaries</comment><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_above_bottom"><field name="value">4</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_below_top"><field name="value">4</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
